paragraphs.text:
val itemsDF = sqlContext.read.format("json")
  .load("file:/root/pipeline/html/advancedspark.com/json/software.json")
  .select($"id", $"title", $"category", $"description")

result.msg: itemsDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [id: bigint, title: string, category: string, description: string]

paragraphs.text: val distinctCategories = itemsDF.select($"category").distinct().collect()

result.msg: distinctCategories: Array[org.apache.spark.sql.Row] = Array([Notebook], [Cloud Provider], [Distribution], [Distributed Cache], [UI], [BI], [Cluster Resource Manager], [Cluster Provision], [Message Broker], [Programming Language], [Streaming], [Distributed Coordinator], [Category], [Search Engine], [Data Processing Execution Engine], [Data Import], [Workflow], [File Format], [Library], [File System], [Database])

paragraphs.text: %md ## TODO:  Add Diagram with Pipeline Stages to help Visualize

result.msg: TODO: Add Diagram with Pipeline Stages to help Visualize

paragraphs.text:
// Split each document into words
val tokenizer = new RegexTokenizer()
  .setInputCol("description")
  .setOutputCol("words")
  .setGaps(false)
  .setPattern("\\p{L}+")

val tf = new HashingTF()
  .setInputCol(stopWordsFilter.getOutputCol)
  .setOutputCol("tfFeatures")

// Limit to top `vocabSize` most common words and convert to word count vector features
val idf = new IDF()
  .setInputCol(tf.getOutputCol)
  .setOutputCol("idfFeatures")

val word2Vec = new Word2Vec()
  .setInputCol(stopWordsFilter.getOutputCol)
  .setOutputCol("word2VecFeatures")

// Combine IF, IDF, and Word2Vec
val featureVectorAssembler = new VectorAssembler()
  .setInputCols(Array(idf.getOutputCol, word2Vec.getOutputCol))
  .setOutputCol("allFeatures")

// Assign an Index to Each Category 
val categoryIndexerModel = new StringIndexer()
  .setInputCol("category")
  .setOutputCol("indexedCategory")
  .fit(itemsDF)

val classifier = new DecisionTreeClassifier()
  .setFeaturesCol(featureVectorAssembler.getOutputCol)
  .setLabelCol(categoryIndexerModel.getOutputCol)
  .setPredictionCol("prediction")
  .setRawPredictionCol("confidence")
  .setProbabilityCol("probability")

val categoryReverseIndexer = new IndexToString()
  .setInputCol(classifier.getPredictionCol)
  .setOutputCol("predictedCategory")
  .setLabels(categoryIndexerModel.labels)
%md ## TODO:  Add N-Gram!  Or do separately

val pipeline = new Pipeline()
  .setStages(Array(tokenizer, stopWordsFilter, tf, idf, word2Vec, featureVectorAssembler, categoryIndexerModel, classifier, categoryReverseIndexer))

val metricName = "f1"

val modelEvaluator = new MulticlassClassificationEvaluator()
  .setLabelCol(classifier.getLabelCol)
  .setPredictionCol(classifier.getPredictionCol)
  .setMetricName(metricName)

val paramGrid = new ParamGridBuilder()
  .addGrid(tf.numFeatures, Array(10, 100))
  .addGrid(idf.minDocFreq, Array(1, 10))
  .addGrid(word2Vec.vectorSize, Array(200, 300))
  .addGrid(classifier.maxDepth, Array(3, 5))
  .build()
  
paramGrid.size

// K-Folds Cross Validation Combined With Param Grid 
val numFolds = 3

val modelValidator = new CrossValidator()
  .setEstimator(pipeline)
  .setEvaluator(modelEvaluator)
  .setEstimatorParamMaps(paramGrid)
  .setNumFolds(numFolds)
val crossValidatorModel = modelValidator.fit(itemsDF)

val bestModel = crossValidatorModel.bestModel.asInstanceOf[PipelineModel]

// Explain params for each stage
val bestHashingTFNumFeatures = bestModel.stages(2).asInstanceOf[HashingTF].explainParams
val bestIDFMinDocFrequency = bestModel.stages(3).asInstanceOf[IDFModel].explainParams
val bestWord2VecVectorSize = bestModel.stages(4).asInstanceOf[Word2VecModel].explainParams
val bestDecisionTreeDepth = bestModel.stages(7).asInstanceOf[DecisionTreeClassificationModel].explainParams

result.msg:
bestModel: org.apache.spark.ml.PipelineModel = pipeline_f659495dee41
bestHashingTFNumFeatures: String = 
inputCol: input column name (current: filteredWords)
numFeatures: number of features (> 0) (default: 262144, current: 10)
outputCol: output column name (default: hashingTF_52f1272b932d__output, current: tfFeatures)
bestIDFMinDocFrequency: String = 
inputCol: input column name (current: tfFeatures)
minDocFreq: minimum of documents in which a term should appear for filtering (default: 0, current: 1)
outputCol: output column name (default: idf_eed9a184f2f7__output, current: idfFeatures)
bestWord2VecVectorSize: String = 
inputCol: input column name (current: filteredWords)
maxIter: maximum number of iterations (>= 0) (default: 1)
minCount: the minimum number of times a token must appear to be included in the word2vec model's vocabulary (default: 5)
numPartitions: number of partitions for sentences of words (default: 1)
outputCol: output column name (default: w2v_7befc491f48a__output, current: word2VecFeatures)
seed: random seed (default: -1961189076)
stepSize: Step size to be used for each iteration of optimization. (default: 0.025)
vectorSize: the dimension of codes after transforming from words (default: 100, current: 300)
windowSize: the window size (context words from [-window, window]) (default: 5)
bestDecisionTreeDepth: String = 
featuresCol: features column name (default: features, current: allFeatures)
labelCol: label column name (default: label, current: indexedCategory)
predictionCol: prediction column name (default: prediction, current: prediction)
probabilityCol: Column name for predicted class conditional probabilities. Note: Not all models output well-calibrated probability estimates! These probabilities should be treated as confidences, not precise probabilities (default: probability, current: probability)
rawPredictionCol: raw prediction (a.k.a. confidence) column name (default: rawPrediction, current: confidence)
thresholds: Thresholds in multi-class classification to adjust the probability of predicting each class. Array must have length equal to the number of classes...

name: NLP/02: Text Classification (TF/IDF + Word2Vec, Decision Tree)
